metadata.dc:author: Vivancos Marín, J
Boada Estivill, J I
Saiz Arnaiz, J M
Aguilà Artal, A
Bella, M R
Rosell Ferrer, M R
metadata.dc:description: Laryngeal polyps are common, but they rarely cause death in head and neck sites. We report three cases of giant laryngeal polyps which produced respiratory distress, cardiorespiratory failure, and sudden death, respectively.
metadata.dc:title: Pólipos gigantes de laringe. Presentación de tres casos y revisión de la literatura.
[Giant laryngeal polyps. Report of three cases and review of the literature].
